column5: Hit the ice this morning for some Pike, it's been 2 months since the last Pike outting due to my new acquired taste for perch.. Set up shop in 9 fow and baited my tip-up with a 9 inch Portugese sardine, not even 20 minutes later bam fish on!!! I would guess she was around 34-36 inches.. The next 2 hours was non stop action and all the pike were caught on deadbait... Marked a fish on the finder and peered down the hole wow a nice size Pike sniffed my jig a few times then swam off wasnt intrested in my plastic minnow...The area produces some nice size Pike and it just so happens I'm on afternoons all week so I can catch the moring bite all fish hit between 8 and 11am..   Although I only landed two it was still a awesome morning....
good like a great day on cooks
Sounds like a very good morning!!!  It's days like that, that keep us coming back and enduring the Skuny days!!!
Sounds like a great day...i'll stay tuned!
Great report trophypikehunter  Sounds like you had fun this morning and pike certainly will pump up the adrenaline when they hit suspended bait  Can't wait to see the vid's Leechman
